name: Pousada de Condeixa-a-Nova Charming Hotel

reviews.text: Very nice hotel, nice rooms and beautiful garden. The pool is rather cold though, for the serious swimmer rather than to just soak.
reviews.title: nice place to relax from sightseeing
Beautful setting
reviews.text: An excellent hotel in a beautful setting with a lovely pool and well kept gardens the service was excellent, the food good though it would be hard to compete with the restaurant next door (O Cabritino) The rooms are nicely done .We had a huge veranda over looking the countryside you could see for miles. we`ll be back, Val.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent a night here during our trip from Porto to Lisbon. After staying in a rather small room in Porto, we were happy to spread out in our very comfortable, superior room here. The place was elegant and peaceful. The breakfast good.

description: The Pousada Condeixa-a-Nova - Santa Cristina is a restored building from the 16th-century where members of the European royalty have stayed, and is located only 2 km (1.2 miles) away from the Roman ruins in Conímbriga. This inn's guestrooms have a classic decor and a private balcony. The Pousada de Santa Cristina has quiet green outdoor gardens. The common areas are elegant and contain antique sculptures. Its famous restaurant offers contemporary versions of classic Portuguese recipes. The motorway that connects Lisbon to Porto is close to Pousada de Santa Cristina.
